content: drops christmas knitted drops angel in garter st pattern and angel in lace pattern in kid-silk and cotton merino drops extra 0-1200 drops design pattern no ks-107 yarn group a and b measurements height approx 7 5 cm / 3 circumference at the bottom approx 14 cm / 5½ materials for both angels drops cotton merino from garnstudio 50 g color no 01 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio 25 g color no 01 off white 1 angel weighs approx 8 g drops double pointed needle size 3 mm / us 2 5 or size needed to get 23 sts x 32 row in stockinette st with 1 strand of each yarn = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm angel worked in the round on double pointed needles wings worked back and forth on double pointed needles top down two versions angel with garter st pattern angel with lace pattern
